examples.example: 我站在他的左边，和他一起欣赏美丽的风景。

translate.english: I stand on his left side and enjoy the beautiful scenery with him.

examples.example: 他总是习惯性地走在我的左边，细心地呵护着我。

translate.english: He always habitually walks on my left side and carefully takes care of me.

examples.example: 在过马路时，他体贴地站在我的左边，守护着我的安全。

translate.english: When crossing the road, he considerately stood on my left side, guarding my safety.
